name: Jumia Technologies AG
description: Jumia Technologies AG is a leading e-commerce platform operating in Africa, often referred to as the 'Amazon of Africa'. Founded in 2012, Jumia connects consumers with sellers and offers a wide range of products, from electronics and fashion to groceries and household items. The company aims to improve the online shopping experience across the continent by providing innovative solutions tailored to local markets. Jumia operates in multiple African countries, including Nigeria, Kenya, Morocco, and Egypt, facilitating transactions through its website and mobile app. The platform not only enables consumers to shop conveniently but also empowers small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) by giving them access to a broader customer base. In addition to e-commerce, Jumia has expanded its services to include Jumia Food, Jumia Logistics, and Jumia Pay, creating a comprehensive ecosystem that supports online shopping and payments. The company's mission is to drive digital transformation and economic development in Africa, contributing to a more connected and efficient marketplace. As Jumia continues to expand its offerings and improve logistics, it is poised to play a significant role in shaping the future of retail in Africa.

faq.answer: Jumia offers e-commerce, food delivery through Jumia Food, and payment solutions via Jumia Pay.
